Title: Afterbirth
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Jessica Sharzer
Actors: Dylan McDermott, Connie Britton, Evan Peters, Taissa Farmiga
Plot: The aftermath of Vivien's difficult labour is revealed and Ben makes plans to get out of the house. Some of the spirits have other plans and the family has to pull together to make it through these very tough changes.
